title:
KYBO 3.0.0
Batman Collection
Batman http://movreel.com/m95ldsuawlh5 http://static.rogerebert.com/uploads/movie/movie_poster/batman-1989/large_u782c0lom0YlLwSWX0X2o72OJDT.jpg http://www.scifibloggers.com/wp-content/uploads/Batman-1989-batman-2686914-1024-576.jpg The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being the clownishly homicidal Joker.
Batman Returns http://vodlocker.com/660g7wld49wz http://i58.fastpic.ru/big/2013/1202/ee/860635b1c04710cebd691a6f0af3b6ee.jpg https://reelclub.files.wordpress.com/2012/05/br1.jpg When a corrupt businessman and the grotesque Penguin plot to take control of Gotham City, only Batman can stop them, while the Catwoman has her own agenda.
Batman Forever http://vodlocker.com/vpsyb8ra6l90 http://i57.fastpic.ru/big/2013/1202/8d/e7d68b459d04ef9e4626a5ea80d13f8d.jpg http://movieboozer.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/batman-forever-1995-movie-hd-wallpaper.jpg Batman must battle Two-Face and The Riddler with help of an amourous psychologist and a young circus acrobat who becomes his sidekick, Robin.
Batman & Robin http://vodlocker.com/oud7qbqqdwdq http://i58.fastpic.ru/big/2013/1202/cc/067a5d73e33cf14fa4e4b76b881625cc.jpg https://nathanditum.files.wordpress.com/2012/03/batmanrobin-660x344.jpg Batman & Robin try to keep their relationship together even as they must stop Mr. Freeze and Poison Ivy from freezing Gotham City.
Batman Begins http://vodlocker.com/3iuwftsosmx1 http://i57.fastpic.ru/big/2013/1202/04/51fc2c6d1e990d256ad5f05776acf804.jpg http://viewhdwallpaper.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/05/Batman-Movie-HD-Wallpaper.jpg After training with his mentor, Batman begins his war on crime to free the crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption that the Scarecrow and the League of Shadows have cast upon it.
The Dark Knight http://vidto.me/ftbstb4cifjl http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/8/83/Dark_knight_rises_poster.jpg https://viewerscommentary.files.wordpress.com/2012/07/the-dark-knight-the-joker.png When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, the caped crusader must come to terms with one of the greatest psychological tests of his ability to fight injustice.
The Dark Knight Rises http://www.nowvideo.sx/video/0111739d69b7f http://fc03.deviantart.net/fs70/f/2012/005/7/a/the_dark_knight_rises_poster_iii_by_mike1306-d4lf9xi.jpg http://i.ytimg.com/vi/eHFA_wEK_00/maxresdefault.jpg Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, the Dark Knight is forced to return from his imposed exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman.
Batman: Mask of the Phantasm http://daclips.in/3lpqstcphu7q http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTMzODU0NTYxN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDUxNzUyMQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://media.dcentertainment.com/sites/default/files/1993-batman-mask-of-the-phantasm-4.jpg Batman is wrongly implicated in a series of murders of mob bosses actually done by a new vigilante assassin.
Batman Beyond: Return of the Joker http://vodlocker.com/f8xa484iycht http://movieposters2.com/images/748923-b.jpg https://nitehawkcinema.files.wordpress.com/2013/02/tfofbctnfffuy8bmfxi3rvoh0a6.jpg The Joker is back with a vengeance, and Gotham's newest Dark Knight needs answers as he stands alone to face Gotham's most infamous Clown Prince of Crime.
Batman: Mystery of the Batwoman http://vodlocker.com/x4hu2235k1zr http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTcyODQ2MjYxM15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTc3MzAwMQ@@._V1_SX500_SY999_.jpg? http://www.movie-roulette.com/photos_big/batman-mystery-of-the-batwoman-1-1.jpeg The Dark Knight must contend with a mysterious female vigilante who emulates him, but to a more ruthless degree.
Batman: Under the Red Hood http://vidplay.net/04bdpkpcu4rm http://ia.media-imdb.com/images/M/MV5BMTMwNDEyMjExOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzU4MDU0Mw@@._V1_SY317_CR8,0,214,317_AL_.jpg https://legendoflaura.files.wordpress.com/2013/11/undertheredhoodmovie.jpeg There's a mystery afoot in Gotham City, and Batman must go toe-to-toe with a mysterious vigilante, who goes by the name of Red Hood. Subsequently, old wounds reopen and old, once buried memories come into the light.
Batman: Year One http://vodlocker.com/sa5bu3ljfbca http://img4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110814145448/dcmovies/images/e/e3/Batman_Year_One.jpg https://mastersfilmreview.files.wordpress.com/2011/12/batman-year-one2.png A wealthy playboy and a Chicago cop both return to Gotham City where their lives will intersect in unexpected ways.
Batman: Assault on Arkham http://movreel.com/mf836anew1yw http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/c/c4/'Batman_Assault_on_Arkham'_cover.jpeg http://i.ytimg.com/vi/-6abltUcric/maxresdefault.jpg Batman works desperately to find a bomb planted by the Joker while Amanda Waller hires her newly formed Suicide Squad to break into Arkham Asylum to recover vital information stolen by the Riddler.
Batman vs. Robin (2015) http://vodlocker.com/19ucy5wcpgq9 http://fs2.directupload.net/images/150403/u8vj296p.jpg http://www.movienewz.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/batman-vs-robin1.jpg While Damian Wayne struggles to cope with Batman's no-killing rule, he soon starts to believe that his destiny lies within a secret society known as, The Court of Owls.
